messages.title: Imagine a better future for the City of Durham
messages.content: Vote for what you believe in. Green Party election communication.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Jonathan wants to improve prospects for all, focusing on the Green New Deal and creating well-paid jobs in renewable energy, insulation, housing, public transport, and care work.

mentions.candidate: Jonathan Elmer is your Green Party Candidate.

issues.economy: Focus on the Green New Deal to create well-paid jobs.
issues.education: Committed to bring schools under local authority control, and to maintain play areas.
issues.environment: Protect open spaces, support renewable energy, and improve home insulation.
issues.governance: Council transparency, oppose incinerators and out-of-town retail developments.
issues.socialWelfare: Housing benefit system needs improvement to tackle rough sleeping.

housing.content: Oppose the Sniperley Park development; supports affordable housing and brownfield regeneration.

leaflet.personalStatement: I believe in local and active representation.

politicalExperience.achievements: Strong record of campaign success, including stopping a waste incinerator and saying 'no' to opencast coal mining.

images.caption: Jonathan Elmer with a solar panel.
Jonathan Elmer engaging in activities such as tree planting and helping the community.
